**Overview**

This dashboard displays key statistics and visualizations for events in Claroty xDome, including event distribution by type, protocol, and IP protocol, as well as insights into destination and source device details. It provides an overview of event trends over time, reports categorized by mode, and highlights top source users, enabling effective monitoring and analysis of network security events.
